sourcing.instructions: - Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace specializing in rare earth metals.
steps: - Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supplier or online marketplace specializing in rare earth metals.
1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure each ingredient using a precision scale.

steps: 1. Place the crucible in a high-temperature furnace.
heating.raw_text: 1. Place the crucible in a high-temperature furnace.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature.

steps: 1. Use a grinder or abrasive tools to shape the solid sample to the desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches).
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a grinder or abrasive tools to shape the solid sample to the desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches).
